se.chalmers.dat255.risk.model

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.chalmers.dat255.risk.model.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPlayer

    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPlayer
    The Player class contains relevant information about the player, such as his name, his ID and what cards he has. Also contains methods for drawing cards and trading them in for troops.

    • Field Summary
